<!-- COPY DOCS -->
<!-- ./session/common-customizations/sign-out.mdx -->

import PreBuiltUITabs from "/src/components/tabs/PreBuiltUITabs";
import {PreBuiltOrCustomUISwitcher, PreBuiltUIContent, CustomUIContent} from "/src/components/preBuiltOrCustomUISwitcher"
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import CustomUITabs, { FrontendMobileSubTabs, FrontendWebSubTabs } from "/src/components/tabs/CustomUITabs";

# Sign out

<PreBuiltOrCustomUISwitcher>

<PreBuiltUIContent>

<PreBuiltUITabs>

<TabItem value="reactjs">

The [`signOut` method](https://supertokens.com/docs/auth-react/modules/recipe_^{docsLinkRecipeName}.html#signOut) revokes the session on the frontend and backend.

```tsx
import React from "react";
// highlight-next-line
import { signOut } from "supertokens-auth-react/recipe/^{codeImportRecipeName}";

function NavBar() {
  async function onLogout() {
    // highlight-next-line
    await signOut();
    window.location.href = "/";
  }
  return (
    <ul>
      <li>Home</li>
          // highlight-next-line
      <li onClick={onLogout}>Logout</li>

    </ul>
  )
}
```

</TabItem>

</PreBuiltUITabs>

- We do not provide any UI for a Sign-out button
- On success, the `signOut` function does not redirect the user to another page.

</PreBuiltUIContent>

<CustomUIContent>

<CustomUITabs>

<TabItem value="web">

<FrontendWebSubTabs>

<TabItem value="npm">

The [`signOut` method](https://supertokens.com/docs/web-js/modules/recipe_session.html#signOut-1) revokes the session for the user.

```tsx
// highlight-next-line
import Session from "supertokens-web-js/recipe/session";

async function logout () {
  // highlight-next-line
  await Session.signOut(); 
  window.location.href = "/";
}
```

</TabItem>

<TabItem value="script">

The [`signOut` method](https://supertokens.com/docs/web-js/modules/recipe_session.html#signOut-1) revokes the session for the user.

```tsx
import Session from "supertokens-web-js-script/recipe/session";
async function logout () {
  // highlight-next-line
  await supertokensSession.signOut(); 
  window.location.href = "/";
}
```

</TabItem>

</FrontendWebSubTabs>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="mobile">

<FrontendMobileSubTabs>

<TabItem value="reactnative">

The [`signOut` method](https://supertokens.com/docs/react-native/modules.html#signOut) revokes the session for the user.

```tsx
// highlight-next-line
import SuperTokens from "supertokens-react-native";

async function logout () {
  // highlight-next-line
  await SuperTokens.signOut(); 
  // redirect the user to the login screen
}
```

</TabItem>

</FrontendMobileSubTabs>

</TabItem>

</CustomUITabs>

- On success, the `signOut` function does not redirect the user to another page.

</CustomUIContent>

</PreBuiltOrCustomUISwitcher>
